ResourceHeader.ResourceName: STEREO-B IMPACT SWEA Level-2 Burst electron moments
ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains the moments of the electron distribution function at the BURST cadence (2 s) computed from the distribution function. It must be noted that, owing to measurement limitations in the low energy range, the moments are only partial moments calculated for energies above 50 eV.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Data provided are publicly available. If used in presentations or publications, please acknowledge STEREO/Waves Investigation (M. Maksimovic and S. D. Bale, PIs). We recommend the data users to contact the STEREO/Waves team early in their study. For reporting purposes, we request bibliography information for any publication, etc., using these data. Please send information on the use of this data to: M. Maksimovic (PI). We suggest to add the following lines into the acknowledgments: The authors acknowledge CNES (Centre National d'Etudes Spatiales), CNRS (Centre National de la Recherche Scientifique), and Observatoire de Paris for support to the STEREO/Waves team and the CDPP (Centre de Donn√©es de la Physique des Plasmas) for the provision of the STEREO/Waves data. The following paper should also be used to reference: - Bougeret et al, Space Science Reviews, 2008, doi:10.1007/s11214-007-9298-8 - Krupar et al., Journal of Geophysical Research, 2012, doi:10.1029/2011JA017333

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron moments quality_index_0
Parameter.Description: quality_index_0 = 0 --> B field INSIDE instrument field-of-view: moments well determined.quality_index_0 = 1 --> B field OUTSIDE instrument field-of-view: moments NOT well determined.

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron moments quality_index_1
Parameter.Description: quality_index_1 = 0 --> Temperature/Heat Flux corrected for ion bulk flow (from STEREO/PLASTIC) quality_index_1 = 1 --> Temperature/Heat Flux NOT corrected for ion bulk flow (Data unavailable)

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron Tpar_b
Parameter.Description: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron temperature along B using pressure tensor in (B,Z^B,B^(Z^B)) Tpar

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron Tper1_b
Parameter.Description: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron temperature along B using pressure tensor in (B,Z^B,B^(Z^B)) Tper1

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron Tper2_b
Parameter.Description: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron temperature along B using pressure tensor in (B,Z^B,B^(Z^B)) Tper2

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron Qr_rtn
Parameter.Description: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron heat flux in RTN Qr

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron Qt_rtn
Parameter.Description: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron heat flux in RTN Yt

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron Qn_rtn
Parameter.Description: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron heat flux in RTN Zn

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron Br_rtn
Parameter.Description: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron B in RTN used in moments computation Br

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron Bt_rtn
Parameter.Description: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron B in RTN used in moments computation Bt

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron Bn_rtn
Parameter.Description: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron B in RTN used in moments computation Bn

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron Qpar
Parameter.Description: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron heat Flux along B Q

Parameter.Name: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron Qper
Parameter.Description: STEREO-B SWEA Burst electron heat Flux perpendicular to B Q
